# How to Download and Install Edius 6.2 for Free
 
Edius 6.2 is a powerful video editing software that allows you to create professional-quality videos with ease. Whether you are a beginner or an expert, Edius 6.2 can help you edit any type of video, from HD to 4K, from SD to HDR, from DV to Blu-ray. You can also use Edius 6.2 to add effects, transitions, titles, audio, and more to your videos.
 
But how can you get Edius 6.2 for free? In this article, we will show you how to download and install Edius 6.2 for free on your PC. Follow these simple steps and enjoy the benefits of Edius 6.2 without paying a dime.
 
**Download Zip ••• [https://corppresinro.blogspot.com/?d=2uFxq2](https://corppresinro.blogspot.com/?d=2uFxq2)**


 
## Step 1: Download Edius 6.2 from the Official Website
 
The first step is to download Edius 6.2 from the official website of Grass Valley, the developer of Edius. You can find the download link [here](https://www.grassvalley.com/products/edius_pro_6_5/). You will need to fill out a form with your name, email address, country, and other details. After submitting the form, you will receive an email with a link to download Edius 6.2.
 
Click on the link and save the file on your PC. The file size is about 1 GB, so it may take some time depending on your internet speed.
 
## Step 2: Extract the File and Run the Setup
 
After downloading Edius 6.2, you will need to extract the file using a software like WinRAR or 7-Zip. You can download WinRAR [here](https://www.win-rar.com/download.html) or 7-Zip [here](https://www.7-zip.org/download.html). Right-click on the file and choose "Extract Here" or "Extract to edius62freedownloadfullversion".
 
Once extracted, open the folder and double-click on the setup.exe file. This will launch the installation wizard of Edius 6.2. Follow the instructions on the screen and accept the terms and conditions. Choose the destination folder where you want to install Edius 6.2 and click "Next". The installation process will begin and may take several minutes.
 
## Step 3: Activate Edius 6.2 with a Serial Number
 
After installing Edius 6.2, you will need to activate it with a serial number. You can get a serial number for free from [this website](https://serialkeygeneratorfree.com/edius-6-serial-number-generator/). Just click on the "Generate" button and copy the serial number that appears.
